patthana23.28:1.1: Naācayagāmiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ācayagāmī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana23.28:2.1: Naācayagāmiṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā ācayagāmī akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.28:3.1: Naācayagāmiṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
